Detailed Description

Directory iterator implementation for flash storage device.

Class FlashDirectoryIteratorImp implements the directory iterator for the flash storage device.

Member Function Documentation

virtual DirectoryIterator& FlashDirectoryIteratorImp::AtomicIncrement (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Increments the iterator to point to the next pathname in the directory and returns a reference to itself. This increment operation does not consider the filter set on construction. Only valid iterators are allowed to be incremented. If this method gets called on the end iterator an assertion holds.

Returns:
Reference to itself incremented to point to the next pathname or to the root pathname signaling the end iterator.

Implements DirectoryIterator.
